Title: Newly sworn-in Gideon Sa'ar in Knesset: Nobody in opposition trie...
Description: In response to charges that he broke promises not to join Netanyahu, Sa'ar said that since October 7 he has decided to 'to set aside the wars between the Jews and focus on the war against our enemies.' In his speech to the Knesset, he accused opposition members who attacked his decision of 'smears, libels and lies' and of having no impact on the country since the war's start

Title: Banned Columbia student who said 'Zionists don't deserve to live'...
Description: A suspension letter from the university cited an incident in which the student organized a human chain to block Zionist students from accessing the campus lawn. According to him, he was denied due process and fair treatment, and was targeted because he is Black and pro-Palestinian

Title: Israel's Education Ministry advised schools to celebrate Nasralla...
Description: The Ministry's Religious Education Administration suggested that schools organize celebrations, such as dancing or distributing food, to mark the death of the Hezbollah leader in an Israeli airstrike. While some schools followed the recommendation, it drew criticism from certain officials

Title: Israel set to enter new phase of Lebanon fighting, meaning close ...
Description: Israel is preparing for a ground incursion into southern Lebanon, an operation that will initially focus on Hezbollah military infrastructure near the border

Title: For Netanyahu's government, the endgame of war is war
Description: Between us and Jordan lies the reality Israel fights to ignore: millions of Palestinians with nowhere to go, waiting – like many Israelis I know – to live in peace. Yet, Israel's refusal to recognize a Palestinian partner and pursue a solution persists, despite Arab neighbors willing to help it get there

Title: Israel at war, day 360: IDF says it killed leaders of Hamas, PFLP...

Title: He already lost one brother in Gaza's tunnels, now he's fighting ...
Description: Sharon Sharabi, whose brother Yossi was killed in Hamas captivity and whose other brother Eli remains a hostage, recently accompanied Prime Minister Netanyahu to the UN. 'He shook my hand, and I said to him: 'Think of this hand as the hand of a hostage reaching out to you for an entire year from Hamas tunnels, saying: I trust you, save me.''

Title: Report: Israel tracked Nasrallah with unknown substance before de...
Description: Saudi news channel Al Hadath reported that an unidentified man traveling from Iran to Beirut met with Nasrallah with the express purpose of shaking his hand in order to transfer a trackable substance onto the leader's palm

Title: Israel's High Court upholds decision to hold security prisoner's ...
Description: The judges dismissed the petition of the family of Walid Daqqa, ruling that the state's decision to withhold his body for use in hostage negotiations with Hamas was reasonable. Daqqa, a Palestinian with Israeli citizenship, died of cancer this year while in prison after fully serving his for his role in the murder of an Israeli soldier in 1987

Title: The young asylum seekers wishing to join the Israeli army, in exc...
Description: They were born and raised in Israel, but have no legal status. The children of Eritrean asylum seekers want nothing more than to be drafted. Now, a controversial plan being advanced by the state may take them up on it

Title: Israel on high alert for Oct. 7 and holiday period; issues warnin...
Description: Israeli security forces are expected to be on high alert after IDF and Shin Bet raised the possibility that Hamas leaders could encourage Gazans to march en masse toward the border with Israel on the one-year anniversary of October 7

Title: Netanyahu's ex-rival gifts him an even stronger grip on power - u...

Title: Israel targets Hezbollah chief Nasrallah in massive Beirut strike...
Description: Israel estimates that Nasrallah was at the Hezbollah headquarters, the site of the strike, during the attack, and two other senior Hezbollah commanders were killed. According to initial estimates from Israeli defense officials, some 300 people were killed in the strike

Title: Israel targets Hezbollah chief Nasrallah in massive Beirut strike...
Description: Israel estimates that Nasrallah was at the Hezbollah headquarters, the site of the strike, during the attack, and two other senior Hezbollah commanders were killed. According to initial estimates from Israeli defense officials, some 300 people were killed in the strike

Title: The war heightens everything': Democrats and Republicans work to...
Description: There could be as many as 500,000 U.S. expats in Israel eligible to vote for either Kamala Harris or Donald Trump on November 5. They won't decide the election, but both parties' activists agree that a large turnout will send an important message to Washington

Title: Israel is taking revenge on Beirut, but the key to resolving the ...
Description: While targeted killings and technological superiority have given Israel an edge and improved its bargaining position, sooner or later it will have to accept reality: they haven't brought the end of the conflict any closer and they haven't extinguished the Palestinian national dream

Title: Israel at war, day 357: Hezbollah chief reportedly survives IDF s...
Description: IDF says it carried out 'precise strike' on Hezbollah's central HQ in southern Beirut ■ White House: U.S.-French cease-fire proposal between Israel and Lebanon was issued after 'careful consultation' with Israel ■ Hamas has stopped responding to cease-fire proposals, diplomatic sources say ■ Hamas' military wing has been defeated, IDF sources tell Haaretz ■ Here's what you need to know 357 days into the war

Title: Retired Israeli General Giora Eiland called for starving Gaza. Do...
Description: Retired major general and former head of the National Security Council Giora Eiland, a man of many contradictions, lays out his proposed plan for the occupation of the northern Gaza Strip |An interview with the ideologue of the war

Title: Iran must decide if Hezbollah's prestige is worth the destruction...
Description: Hezbollah is the foreign entity paying the most for contributing to the Palestinian struggle against Israel, but lacking critical communications systems and suffering heavy casualties, the group could opt for a cease-fire

Title: Netanyahu at UN, met with mass walkouts, insists Israel will cont...
Description: We don't seek to resettle Gaza, we seek a demilitarized and deradicalized Gaza,' Netanyahu told the assembly. He castigated the UN, calling it an 'antisemitic swamp,' and said the looming ICC arrest warrants are 'hard to explain as anything other than pure antisemitism'

Title: After stopping Netanyahu ally, Israel's top legal adviser faces f...
Description: Israel's Justice Ministry is collecting evidence of National Security Minister Ben-Gvir's criminal offenses committed in his tenure as head of the Israel Police – during which he has bypassed top officials, trampled on its independence and turned it into a political organization

Title: Amid protests, pressure and rebukes, Netanyahu to address UN Gene...
Description: Like previous speeches, Netanyahu will undoubtedly cast Iran as the international community's primary antagonist. This will be given even greater emphasis considering Iran's backing of proxy organizations behind the deadliest year in Israel's history

Title: Moody's lowers Israel's credit rating for second time amid escala...
Description: In February, Moody's downgraded Israel's rating to A2. The change reflects not only the geopolitical escalation but also Moody's lack of confidence in the Israeli government's ability to manage fiscal consolidation and reduce debt

Title: Moody's poised to lower Israel's credit rating for second time am...
Description: In February, Moody's downgraded Israel's rating to A2. The upcoming change reflects not only the geopolitical escalation but also Moody's lack of confidence in the Israeli government's ability to manage fiscal consolidation and reduce debt

Title: TheMarker, Haaretz's Israeli Agents of Chaos investigation wins p...
Description: Led by TheMarker's Gur Megiddo, Haaretz's Omer Benjakob and French journalist Frédéric Métézeau, the investigation exposed an Israeli-based operation specializing in hacking, fake identities, and disinformation to manipulate elections worldwide

Title: Uncle of hostage Avinathan Or: 'Divisions between families over d...
Description: Shimon Or, uncle of Avinathan Or, is a member of the Tikva Forum, which calls for continued military pressure on Hamas, but fights alongside all hostage families. 'We say opposing things during Knesset meetings, but then we meet outside and realize we're all stuck on the same boat'

Description: The fire came some thirty minutes after Hezbollah announced that its drone chief, who also reportedly oversaw the launch of missiles and drones from Yemen, had been assassinated in a strike in Beirut on Thursday

Title: Netanyahu's New York trip is another opportunity for Israel to mi...
Description: Israel has the chance to entirely change the national situation from the past year – but that is something the old Netanyahu would have done ■ After the procrastinating and quibbling, now Netanyahu is back to his old tricks and taking credit were it isn't due ■ The prime minister's New York schedule has its own rules. And why Isaac Amit drives Yariv Levin crazy

Title: Western diplomats: Israeli ministers' rejection of Hezbollah ceas...
Description: Members of Netanyahu's cabinet have staunchly opposed the U.S.-French proposal for a 21-day cease-fire between Israel and Hezbollah, with his office dismissing reports of an imminent deal

Title: After ministers blast potential Israel-Hezbollah cease-fire, Neta...
Description: While Likud and far-right Israeli ministers staunchly opposed the U.S.-French proposal presented by Biden and Macron for a 21-day cease-fire between Israel and Lebanon, Netanyahu's office dismissed it outright: 'The prime minister hasn't even responded'

Title: The Bibas family a year on: Normal life unthinkable while our rel...
Description: Kfir Bibas was 9 months old when he was kidnapped with his brother Ariel, 4, and their parents Yarden and Shiri. The approaching one-year anniversary finds the Bibas family consumed by terror and anguish. Yarden's sister, Ofri Bibas, talks to Haaretz about the unconscionable failure to return them to Israel

Title: Israel hoping Lebanon attacks force Hezbollah to make a deal, but...

Title: Israel hoping Lebanon attacks force Hezbollah to make a deal, but...

An agreement restoring quiet to Israel's northern border will take time

Title: Israeli principal summoned for hearing after calling Netanyahu a ...
Description: In a video, the principal of Tel Aviv's Gymnasia Herzliya stated, 'We will not learn until we bring back every last hostage.' A hearing will decide whether to revoke his teaching license

Title: America's exasperation with Netanyahu came too late
Description: As Joe Biden address the UN for the last time, and his administration comes to terms with the fact that a Gaza deal won't happen in the time he has left in office, one must ask: How could a group of people who deciphered Putin so accurately in Ukraine have been so easily manipulated by Netanyahu?

Title: As Israel widens war, Gallant triumphs over Netanyahu in their in...

Description: Five years after its establishment, what films is the Shomron Cinema Fund producing, who's working with it, and how does it stand to benefit from the culture minister's proposed changes?

Description: Mayim Bialik offered support for Kiryat Bialik, named after her great-great-grandfather's cousin, Israel's poet Haim Nahman Bialik, following heavy rocket fire from Lebanon: 'My heart is with all the innocent citizens'

Title: Fleeing homes as Israel and Hezbollah fight, terrified Lebanese c...
Description: Some residents of Lebanon received calls urging them to leave their homes, while others woke up to the sound of incessant explosions. They express a feeling of despair, saying, 'I've seen some tough wars in Lebanon. I've grown old, and I see only wars'

Title: Why Israeli shares are climbing as attack on Lebanon escalates
Description: An ever hopeful Tel Aviv Stock Exchange sees the latest surge in fighting as a sign that the war is coming to end. But the end for the economy is a long way off

Title: New group of Israeli-Americans vows to get out the vote for Harri...
Description: The newly established group 'Israeli-Americans for Kamala' says it'll assure that Israeli and Jewish Americans are 'a factor in their vote,' making people understand 'why it is so important to elect Vice President Harris.' Title: I had a crazy idea: collect all important Israeli art created af...

Some of it is now on show in a new exhibition at Tel Aviv Museum of Art called 'I Don't Want to Forget,' and the Jewish collector is determined to bring the works to museums abroad, despite the political climate

Title: Israel tells ICC it has no jurisdiction to issue arrest warrants,...
Description: While Israel says the ICC must allow it to investigate possible violations of international law itself, experts told Haaretz that Israel has not sufficiently investigated or prosecuted those suspected of human rights violations and war crimes

Title: Russia's shadow war against Israel revealed: Fueling Arab discont...
Description: Leaked documents from the Kremlin-affiliated Russian company behind a global disinformation campaign show how Moscow spread fake news in Israel, planned to bolster the standing of Netanyahu and hoped to influence elected officials while promoting antisemitic and anti-Israel content abroad

Title: IDF probe finds Rafah helicopter crash that killed two soldiers c...
Description: An interim report by the Israel Air Force ruled that the chopper crash in southern Gaza was caused by poor visibility conditions and not by enemy fire or a technical malfunction

Title: Hezbollah and Iran stick to their strategy in Gaza war, leaving I...

Title: White House rejects report that U.S. officials believe Gaza cease...

Title: Ever-scheming Netanyahu left Sa'ar in the lurch and a sword hover...

Title: British man in Israel hoping to make aliyah deported after being ...
